Hi, welcome to my site :). I'd like to use this page as an opportunity for you to get to know me a little better.

I'm currently an undergraduate at UCLA studying Electrical Engineering and Computer Engineering (EECE).

In the world of EE, I'm interested in digital logic design and general circuit theory. In the world of CS, I'm interested in full-stack web development. You can find out more about my skills and experience here.

During my free time, I usually find myself reading, coding, or hanging out with friends.

I also like doodling and making art in almost any context... for better or for worse.
